entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 9 with temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9 with temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
